Text:
Watchfire速 WebQA, the next generation of Linkbot, is a website quality testing tool for small or departmental websites. WebQA assists with quality assurance and accessibility testing by reporting on web content issues to help developers and quality assurance staff pinpoint and fix quality, interaction and accessibility defects.

Read more about it at: http://www.watchfire.com/resources/webqa-overview.pdf

Were is it when you need it...
if you put it up you should seed it...
